name: MailChimp for GigPress
author: therightsw

sections.description:
MailChimp for GigPress WordPress plugin is developed by The Right Software web development company. It requires that GigPress be installed already on the WordPress. Then you can select GigPress events into this plugin and select MailChimp template to send to users. The MailChimp for GigPress WordPress plugin selects upcoming events into an HTML and inserts into the MailChimp template body using mc:edit. The campaign will be sent immediately. You must own a valid MailChimp account to use this plugin.

Note: We are independent from GigPress and MailChimp. We did this for a client and then made a small present for all WP users.

For more info about WordPress plugin development, visit The Right Software plugin development services page.
View other WordPress Plugins.
Send your problems to hello@therightsw.com. Dont forget to mention WordPress and WooCommerce versions.

Features:

Integration with GigPress
Integration with MailChimp API
Select MailChimp template

Future Updates:

Allow for campaign scheduling using WP-cron.

Features

  • Integration with GigPress
  • Integration with MailChimp API
  • Select MailChimp template

Support

Visit MailChimp for WordPress page on The Right Software website for details and discussion about MailChimp for GigPress plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Install GigPress then install this plugin MailChimp for GigPress.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
